author: donaldp
msg: Remove resolveFile method as it is already implemented in AbstractTask.

author: donaldp
msg: setProperty() is inherited from AbstractTask and actually delegates to TaskContext to do the work.
getBaseDirectory() is also inherited from AbstractTask and also delegates to TaskContext.

author: donaldp
msg: Description is a container concern - not a tasks concern.

author: donaldp
msg: No need for there to be a initialize method.
Now that tasks are initialized and executed in one sweep initialize functions could just be done at the start of an execute call.
